links.*: Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien
The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide

wikitext.*:
On [[9 December]] [[1965]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Miss Jaworski'''.<ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}, p. 648</ref>

*'''Subject:''' In the words of [[Wayne G. Hammond|Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull|Scull]], Tolkien writes that "''[h]e is not interested in drama and does not want his work dramatized''".<ref name=CG/>
*'''Publication:''' A description of the letter appeared in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide|The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Chronology]]''.
